ad_text: Leader Freight Systems Sponsored At Leader Freight Systems, we understand just how important it is for truck drivers to be satisfied in their work environment and to have their needs met. We strive to provide our drivers with the best possible work experience. From offering competitive pay and benefits, to providing support 24/7, no forced dispatch, to creating a safe and comfortable working environment. We are committed to the success of our drivers! Open positions at Leader Freight Systems: - Company driver - Up to .75 CPM - Owner operator - 9% company fee - Lease to purchase - Great offers If the mentioned above sounds great, feel free and check out our easy-to-apply form on our website: https://leaderfreightsystems.com/apply-now/ #leaderfreightsystems

Leader Freight Systems Sponsored JOB DESCRIPTION: -Company fee only 9%! -Auto liability and Cargo insurance $250 (weekly) -Trailer rent $350 (weekly) -Occupational insurance $45 (weekly, optional) -Physical damage insurance 6% of truck's value (monthly, optional) -Prepass $30 (monthly) -Best pass (48 states) $20 (monthly) Company provides: -Plates if needed -Ipass for tolls (weekly deductions) -Direct deposit -Cash advance available -Fuel Cards with up to .30cpg discount at Pilot, Love's, and Flying J -Safety and driver referrals bonuses -24/7 Dispatch and tracking team -No force dispatch -Spanish, Serbian, Arabic dispatchers available We require: -Minimum 2 years of experience -Clean driving record Fuel discount starting with 10cpg, weekly pay Sign Up
